::Lord Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus typed controls, returning the signal to Scorponok.

Jhiaxus: This is Lord Jhiaxus, Co-Commander of the Generation 2 Decepticon Empire. I am transmitting the coordinates to my present location. You may come here but be sure to remain undetected.

::Scorponok/Zarak::

Zarak receives the coordinates and without a reply heads for Hydras' base.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
hYDRAS:
  
 "Permition granted" said the male, altough his ego  was pleaced that Jhiaxus asked permition he remembered that Jhiaxus  belonged to the treacherous Starscream faction
  
  
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Richard    Allen 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Monday, October 22, 2007 10:55    AM
   Subject: Generation 2
   

      ::Lord Jhiaxus::

While with Hydras at the Predacon base, Jhiaxus    began to receive the signal from Scorponok. At first he couldn't make it    out.

Jhiaxus: I'm receiveing some kind of old Decepticon signal. It's    coming through the base systems.

Jhiaxus takes position at the nearest    communication console and starts typing commands in.

Jhiaxus: I think    it's the other G2 we picked up earlier. He must be trying to contact me. If I    can decode the signal I can order him to come here through channels that only    he and I can get to. We could use more numbers to our cause. Permission to    invite a friend, Hydras?
